derivation: perhaps from the same as G1966 (ἐπιούσιος);
strongs_def: tomorrow's; but more probably from G1909 (ἐπιούσιος) and a derivative of the present participle feminine of G1510 (ἐπιούσιος); for subsistence, i.e. needful
outline:
1. word found in the phrase
    1. the bread of our necessity
    2. the bread that suffices for each day
